Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the fourth in a series of sightings, every night around 10 p.m.they are there, increasing in numbers every night. I am a pilot and there is no way that airplanes can move like these. They dart, zig-azg and change colors. It often looks like they are "docking" on larger craft. The sighting took place in my back yard, looking west. Many other people around here are seeing them too, Littleton, Franconia, and even in Gorham, about 40 miles away. People of all ages and backgrounds. My wife saw them too and she has never seen a UFO. I have seen many, in the air and in the Gorham NH area, site of many sightings.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bethlehem
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Moving changing lights over Connecticut River Valley in north-western NH
